catalog_info.title: Elementary Classical Tibetan
catalog_info.description: An introductory course designed for students with no background in classical Tibetan. Students begin with the Tibetan script, its standard transliteration into Roman characters, and pronunciation before proceeding to the basics of Tibetan grammar. After mastering a foundational vocabulary, students begin translating simple Tibetan texts.

person.display_name: Leonard W. J. van der Kuijp
